sect2.title: &groq;
sect2.para: The &groqware; Suite is reportedly available from for registered users.

caution.title: &suse; not supported by &groq;
caution.para: Packages for &suse; operating systems are not advertised to be available.
You would have to find out whether and how kernel driver sources are available to build them yourself for &suse;, and their packages may need to be installed into a container.
